title: Bloomberg Pays ‘Influencers’, Heidi Klum Gets Called A White Woman! 2.10.20
itunes:title: Bloomberg Pays ‘Influencers’, Heidi Klum Gets Called A White Woman! 2.10.20
description:
In episode 566, Jack and special guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by Scam Goddess Laci Mosley to discuss how the mainstream media is portraying the 'top Democratic candidates' for the 2020 election, Uber and Lyft drivers problematic reactions to the Coronavirus, the Harvey Weinstein trial, Kirk Douglas, Heidi Klum defending America's Got Talent, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Pete Buttigieg continues to surge in N.H. polling
  2. Mike Bloomberg Is Paying ‘Influencers’ to Make Him Seem Cool
  3. Inside the Ugly Uber and Lyft Driver Freakout Over Coronavirus
  4. This Is the Toughest Question Facing Harvey Weinstein’s Jury
  5. The 'ultimate feminist' defending Harvey Weinstein
  6. Harvey Weinstein's lawyer says she's never been sexually assaulted 'because I would never put myself in that position'
  7. Did Robert Downey Jr. Really Just Accuse Kirk Douglas of a Brutal Rape?
  8. Lana Wood, Natalie’s Little Sister, Has Plenty to Say
  9. Heidi Klum defends ‘AGT’ after Gabrielle Union calls out toxic work environment
  10. WATCH: Mac Miller - Jet Fuel (Audio)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
